verses.text: My \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w words|strong="H0561"\w*, and lay \w up|strong="H6845"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* with thee.
\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, and \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; and my \w law|strong="H8451"\w* as the \w apple|strong="H0380"\w* of thine \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*.
\w Bind|strong="H7194"\w* them upon thy \w fingers|strong="H0676"\w*, \w write|strong="H3789"\w* them upon the \w table|strong="H3871"\w* of thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, Thou \add art\add* my \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*; and \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w understanding|strong="H0998"\w* \add thy\add* \w kinswoman|strong="H4129"\w*:

That they may \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thee from the \w strange|strong="H2114"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, from the \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* \add which\add* \w flattereth|strong="H2505"\w* with her \w words|strong="H0561"\w*.
¶ For at the \w window|strong="H2474"\w* of my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* I \w looked|strong="H8259"\w* through my \w casement|strong="H0822"\w*,

And \w beheld|strong="H7200"\w* among the simple \w ones|strong="H6612"\w*, I \w discerned|strong="H0995"\w* among the \w youths|strong="H1121"\w*, a young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w void|strong="H2638"\w* of \w understanding|strong="H3820"\w*,\f + \fr 7.7 \ft the youths: Heb. the sons\f*

Passing \w through|strong="H5674"\w* the \w street|strong="H7784"\w* \w near|strong="H0681"\w* her \w corner|strong="H6434"\w*; and he \w went|strong="H6805"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to her \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

In the \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w*, in the \w evening|strong="H3117"\w*, in the \w black|strong="H0380"\w* and \w dark|strong="H0653"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*:\f + \fr 7.9 \ft in the evening: Heb. in the evening of days\f*

And, behold, there \w met|strong="H7125"\w* him a \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \add with\add* the \w attire|strong="H7897"\w* of an \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, and \w subtil|strong="H5341"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.
(She \add is\add* \w loud|strong="H1993"\w* and \w stubborn|strong="H5637"\w*; her \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* \w abide|strong="H7931"\w* not in her \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:

\w Now|strong="H6471"\w* \add is she\add* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, \w now|strong="H6471"\w* in the \w streets|strong="H7339"\w*, and lieth in \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w at|strong="H0681"\w* every \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*.)

So she \w caught|strong="H2388"\w* him, and \w kissed|strong="H5401"\w* him, \add and\add* with an \w impudent|strong="H5810"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him,\f + \fr 7.13 \ft with…: Heb. she strengthened her face and said\f*

\add I have\add* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H2077"\w* with me; this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* have I \w payed|strong="H7999"\w* my \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.\f + \fr 7.14 \ft I have…: Heb. Peace offerings are upon me\f*
Therefore came I \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* thee, diligently to \w seek|strong="H7836"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and I have \w found|strong="H4672"\w* thee.

I have \w decked|strong="H7234"\w* my \w bed|strong="H6210"\w* with \w coverings|strong="H4765"\w* of tapestry, with \w carved|strong="H2405"\w* \add works\add*, with fine \w linen|strong="H0330"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.
I have \w perfumed|strong="H5130"\w* my \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* with \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, \w aloes|strong="H0174"\w*, and \w cinnamon|strong="H7076"\w*.

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, let us take our \w fill|strong="H7301"\w* of \w love|strong="H1730"\w* until the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*: let us \w solace|strong="H5965"\w* ourselves with \w loves|strong="H0159"\w*.
For the \w goodman|strong="H0376"\w* \add is\add* not at \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, he is \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* a \w long|strong="H7350"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*:

He hath \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* a \w bag|strong="H6872"\w* of \w money|strong="H3701"\w* with \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, \add and\add* will \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* at the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w appointed|strong="H3677"\w*.\f + \fr 7.20 \ft with…: Heb. in his hand\f*\f + \fr 7.20 \ft the day…: or, the new moon\f*

With her \w much|strong="H7230"\w* fair \w speech|strong="H3948"\w* she caused him to \w yield|strong="H5186"\w*, with the \w flattering|strong="H2506"\w* of her \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* she \w forced|strong="H5080"\w* him.

He \w goeth|strong="H1980"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* her \w straightway|strong="H6597"\w*, as an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*, or as a \w fool|strong="H0191"\w* to the \w correction|strong="H4148"\w* of the \w stocks|strong="H5914"\w*;\f + \fr 7.22 \ft straightway: Heb. suddenly\f*

Till a \w dart|strong="H2671"\w* \w strike|strong="H6398"\w* through his \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*; as a \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w hasteth|strong="H4116"\w* to the \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*, and \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* not that it \add is\add* for his \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.
¶ \w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me now therefore, O ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, and \w attend|strong="H7181"\w* to the \w words|strong="H0561"\w* of my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.
Let not thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w decline|strong="H7847"\w* to her \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, go not \w astray|strong="H8582"\w* in her \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*.
For she hath cast \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w*: yea, many \w strong|strong="H6099"\w* \add men\add* have been \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* by her.

Her \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add is\add* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w hell|strong="H7585"\w*, going \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w chambers|strong="H2315"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.
